Crafting UX Week 5

Where we learn about Bootstrap

Github

The place to go to find open source software.

Bower

Great for discovering front end tools & libraries on github.

Codepen

Where to go when you want to copy/paste a solution into your project.

Stack Overflow

A Q&A site for programmers.

Libraries & Frameworks

jQuery

“write less, do more.”


/* native javascript */
var elements = document.querySelectorAll('p');
Array.prototype.forEach.call(elements, function(el, i){
  el.addEventListener('click',function(e){
    if (el.classList) {
      el.classList.toggle('active');
    } else {
      var classes = el.'active'.split(' ');
      var existingIndex = classes.indexOf('active');

      if (existingIndex >= 0)
        classes.splice(existingIndex, 1);
      else
        classes.push('active');

      el.className = classes.join(' ');
    }
  });
});


/* jquery */
$('p').on('click',function(e){
  $(this).toggleClass('active')
});

React

“A javascript library for building user interfaces.”
